structure.question: The question that was asked
structure.context: A few sentences describing the context in which the question was asked

subjects.name: Name of an subject mentioned or implied in the question
subjects.assumption: An assumption that you made when identifying this subject
subjects.critique: How might this assumption be wrong?
subjects.question: A question that could be asked to test the assumption

objects.name: Name of an object mentioned or implied in the question
objects.assumption: An assumption that you made when discerning this object
objects.critique: How might this assumption be wrong?
objects.question: A question that could be asked to test the assumption
